content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No permanent structures have been successfully created on the map. Although several recovery updates were aimed at supplying a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5), all attempts—from querying for an existing Lab to placing or crafting one—failed due to inventory shortages and missing sub-ingredients. Other entities (such as furnaces used for smelting in the recovery process) were referenced for production purposes but were not newly built structures.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage for Entity Retrieval
  - When calling get_entities, ensure parameters match its defined signature. Avoid passing unexpected keywords (e.g., using “radius”) or extra positional arguments.

• Handling Non‐Iterable Returns
  - Check that the return value from get_entities is valid (not None) before iterating. Default to an empty list if no entities are returned.

• Structure Placement Failures
  - Verify that required items (such as a Lab) exist in the inventory before attempting placement to prevent placement errors.

• Lab Crafting Requirements
  - Ensure that all sub-ingredients for Lab crafting are producible. Establish and verify production chains for items like iron-plate (for iron-gear-wheel), copper-plate and copper-cable (for electronic-circuit), so that resource shortages do not block Lab creation.
  - Confirm that the ingredient quantities meet recipe requirements; recurring errors like missing iron-gear-wheel indicate a need to pre-supply the expected amounts before reattempting crafting.

NAMESPACE
(No user-defined functions were identified.)
